::Battera::

"But, I don't have allies.  I can try to warn the other Maximals of 
this threat.  But, Oh cripes. Hang on."

She walked into the ship and walked towards the bridge.  She made it 
to the door way and called out to anyone on the bridge.  "PIck up a 
maximal comm signal, Frequencey 182. He says there is someone named 
Unicron headed our way and he's not a nice bot."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Primal Prime::
> 
>     "You got that right, he once tried to destroy Cybertron," Prime 
said.
> "Listen if you could contact as many allies as you can, please tell 
them of
> the treat of Unicron."
